info.name: Lichess board: All Coordinates
info.description: This style adds the respective coordinates to each square of the chess board. Works both for white and black orientation, applied across the website for every board.
info.additionalInfo:
To apply the style, click on your profile name (top right corner) -> Board Theme -> CHOOSE THE PURPLE THEME

The images the CSS is using are not well-polished but I'm ok with them, they do their job and I don't feel like investing much time into making them perfect. If their imperfections bother you, PM me on lichess (@moskvitin) with your improvements suggestions.
